name: serverless-boilerplate
description: basic boilerplate with offline development setup

scripts.postinstall: cd api && cd todo && npm install
scripts.db-setup: cd api && cd todo && sls dynamodb install
scripts.db-remove: cd api && cd todo && sls dynamodb remove
scripts.deploy-s3: cd web && aws s3 --profile default sync ./build/ s3://todo.sejalv.online --region eu-west-1

author: Manoj Fernando <manojf@99x.lk>
